name: Metavoidal
description: Play as a drummer seeking revenge on a Metal Band of Eldritch Monsters in this wacky roguelite brawler. Fight through hordes of enemies with only your drumsticks & drumming techniques as your weapons. Tap into the power of their music by finding corrupted music discs to increase your strength to defeat each of the band members. Are you good enough to escape the corrupted hellscape, once and for all?

name: Salvus: Aries
description: A mature slice of death and adventure fantasy otome visual novel that begins at the bad ending.

name: True Fear: Forsaken Souls Part 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Bunker Builder Simulator
description: Plan your work, dig a hole and build a bunker, that will survive anything! Manage safety, needs and moods of your clients, so you can become the best architect and earn a fortune. Will you be able to meet the expectations?

name: Rock Paper Scissors Ultimate
description: Rock Paper Scissors Ultimate is a roguelike deckbuilder where the players can enhance the classic gameplay with powerful cards to gain an advantage over their opponents.

name: Kaiju Catastrophe
description: Crush, smash, and eat thousands of enemies showing humanity what the meaning of destruction is! Kaiju Catastrophe is an arcade game with roguelite mechanics. Mutate devastating weapons, unlock permanent evolutions, and wreak havoc with a variety of monsters to tear humanity apart! Wishlist today!

name: Earth of Oryn
description: Earth of Oryn is an indie city-builder/strategy game set in a medieval world filled with story and heart. Starting from nothing, shape your kingdom according to your vision while managing the needs and wants of your people.

name: Xion Leak
description: Cooperate quickly as a duo and set the fastest times to win the trophies! Escape before the Xion gas fries your precious circuits! Run fast, be in sync, and avoid the countless dangers that the mysterious Foreman has placed in your path.

name: Dreamed Away
description: Dreamed Away is an emotional action-adventure RPG with psychological horror elements. Play as Théo, a boy lost in a dark, mysterious world. Explore a unique reality, duel against darkness in a unique, fast paced combat system and mind your choices.

name: Seclusa
description: You're a wildlife photographer staying at a cozy, secluded safari lodge in East Africa. Spend time relaxing at scenic outlooks, snapping photos of local wildlife, and working your way through a variety of upgrades and unlockables in this laid-back photography sandbox.

name: Beacon of Neyda
description: In a world where a robot revolution failed, the last humans search for a way to survive and escape. Beacon of Neyda is a side-scroller strategy game where you have to survive waves of enemies while creating and upgrading your base. Build where you want - Defend what you can.

name: Duel Corp.
description: An action RPG that you can play alone and later with a friend during Early Access. It features an unrestricted class and AI system with fluid and challenging direction-based combat. Discover epic items, hidden secrets, unique skills and talents in a procedurally generated retro fantasy world.

name: Dice Gambit
description: A turn based tactics game where you roll and allocate dice to control your characters in combat. Completely customize your characters build with a huge array of powers that allow for boundless combinations. All set in a Neo-renaissance metropolis, filled with aristocratic families vying for power.

name: Out of Hands
description: Out of Hands is a card-based thriller that blends card battles, video collage and psychological horror. With nightmarish roguelike elements and live-action visuals made out of the real hands of the developer, the game provides an intriguing and spine-chilling experience that leads you to combat the mental struggles and retrieve the lost memory.

name: Demonschool
description: Demonschool is a new-style tactics RPG where motion equals action. Defeat big weirdos in between the human and demon worlds as Faye and her misfit companions, while navigating university life on a mysterious island.

name: Freeride
description: Freeride is a game about YOU. Board a train to the Spirit World in our oddball RPG where you make friends, use telekinesis, find secrets, consume ice cream and chart your own path. Each character is uniquely troubled, and in helping them find their way, you might just find yourself, too.

name: Good Heavens!
description: Good Heavens! is a procedurally generated open world crafting RPG for 1-8 players. Be a farmer, hunter, trader or warrior and explore the promised lands full of different races and cultures. Lead the heavens to salvation or who cares, find the best werewolf tavern and get drunk.

name: Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution
description: The long-lost sequel to the original Shantae, is back in development after being put on the shelf for nearly two decades. Building off the original game code from the early 2000s, this once-canceled title will be completed and released physically on a Game Boy Advance-compatible game cartridge.

name: The Perfect Pencil
description: Help John on his journey of personal growth. Unravel the nuances of human reactions to fear. Surprising exploration, fast paced combat, complex choices and allegorical characters, all intertwined with a psychological narrative in this hand-drawn 2D action-platformer.

name: So to Speak
description: Can you learn a language by solving puzzles? So to Speak is a simulation game about wandering around Japan, looking at signs, overhearing conversations, and using context clues in the environment to figure out what it all means. No background in Japanese is assumed.

name: Brutal John
description: Brutal John is a fast-paced ultraviolent old school FPS combining crazy storyline about saving the world from the mining technlogies, with inspired gameplay from the best shooters of the '90s. Rip apart alien enemies, destroy mining technologies, save the world.

name: Bugaboo Pocket
description:
Bugaboo Pocket is a virtual pet game starring bugs from land, air and sea!

Play as a research scientist living in a cabin with just your bugs and a penpal for company. Spoil them with pets, minigames, food and furniture.

Raise and release bugs to help Beetleback Ridge recover from a devastating fire.

name: SGS Spain at War
description: The complete Spanish Civil War from July 1936 to April 1939, with all units, weapons and events included on a weekly base. The most complete strategy game made on this conflict. Fight for your ideals, and take control of Spain!

name: Multi Idle
description: Multi Idle is an idle game that features Exploring, Adventuring, Hero's, Dungeons, Raids and many more in its own kind of idling way. Get stuck in an endless loop of trying new things every time you play!

name: Sopa: Tale of the Stolen Potato
description: Emotional narrative adventure about the things we pass along. Inspired by Miyazaki, Coco, and The Little Prince.

name: Overlook
description: Search for missing people, lost objects, or even help people solve their problems by handing them over their required items. OVERLOOK is hand-drawn, cozy, relaxing, and funny. btw, watch! there might be a cat hidden in bushes.

name: Sultan of Egypt
description: Features of this game is an atmospheric story game with choices. There are Puzzle, mini war, and a very nice interactive story in the game. True beauty is always beyond imagination; and a story, or anything for that matter, is important, only to the extent it reflects a ray of it.

name: Gaucho and the Grassland
description: Gaucho and the Grassland is an Animal Farm Sim game where you need to gather resources, explore the land, breed animals and much more, to overcome the challenging life on the grasslands. The world of Gaucho is a mystical wildland, inspired by South Brazil's culture and its local tales.

name: Smipat and the Lost Bones
description: In Smipat and the Lost Bones you follow the life of Smipat, a necromancer's pet with a will of it's own. Smipat has lost some of it's bones and is going on an adventure to find them. Each bone has it's own unique ability that makes it possible to overcome the challenges ahead.

name: Tuggowar
description: Tuggowar is a pure deckbuilding game with strategy elements inspired by RTS. Discover new strategies and combos to find the best build each time! Disrupt the enemy's gameplan, or Tank-rush to catch them off guard. Climb the ranks in PvP or chill vs AI.

name: Post Trauma
description: Post Trauma is a game that takes inspiration from classic horror games. Play as Roman, a 57 year old man who has awakened in a strange and hostile place and find a way back home with his family. Get inside this world through fixed camera angles, alternating the gameplay with some sections in first person view. Solve puzzles and riddles with the information you will gather exploring your surroundings. Avoid (or kill) the creatures that you will find along the way, but be careful because some of them might not be hostile.

name: Noble's Life: Kingdom Reborn
description: Mix of realistic medieval noble simulator with a strategy game of historical depth. Manage your city and villages and make decisions in non-linear events. Command defenses in epic sieges and organize dangerous raids.

name: Radiolight
description: Ashwood Creek, 1985. A child disappears without a trace. A local policeman is drawn into a national park, seeking the truth. Mysterious radio signals beckon him further and further. Investigate, survive and face the unknown in Radiolight— an '80s thriller by solo dev Krystof Knesl.

name: An Amazing Wizard
description: An Amazing Wizard is a 2D fast-paced metroidvania-inspired spell-slinging combat RPG game with detailed pixel art. You play as a wizard from legend, wielding the magic of 7 elements cast by mysterious hands. Enhance your spells and melee weapons, defeat enemies to level up and choose from 250 perks. Discover and equip 250 artifacts, and merge 100 unique spells in any desired order. Collect your lost memories and uncover the hidden truth about this world.

name: Post-Apo Builder
description: Build your own city in a post-apocalyptic future. Scavenge and fight for resources, everything counts! Restore civilization on the ashes of the fallen world! Explore wastelands to gather resources, protect and take care of your people! Fight off raiders, wild tribesman and natural disasters.

name: Galaxy Highways
description: Galaxy Highways is a sci-fi space shooter where you're doing pirate raids into star systems inhabited by aliens. You destroy enemy ships, space stations, mother ships or bosses and complete all missions as soon as possible before enemy defense system destroys you with its powerful waves of attacks.

name: Storror Parkour Pro
description: Escape Reality. The ultimate multiplayer parkour experience. Escape, race, and explore the streets and rooftops of London’s Isle of Dogs. Join team STORROR to save your estate, or challenge your friends to test their skills. STORROR Parkour Pro is complete control and freedom of movement.

name: Matthew: Last Journey
description: Matthew: Last Journey - is a 3D indie adventure exploration game made in a low poly style. You will explore different locations and learn the story about the boy and his family. You will have a fascinating journey through picturesque places and try to find all the memorable objects.

name: Parkour Bot
description: Parkour Bot is a fast paced, rhythm based, physics platform game, with an unique movement set of main character. Show your skills and get a lot of achievements in 100 dynamic levels.

name: Treasure Islands
description: Help Nick and Pippa find a selection of new artefacts and exhibits for the Grand Museum in an exciting adventure across a number of islands, each with their own quirks, characters and strange events!

name: Wardens Rising
description: A Coop PvE Action Hero Shooter with MOBA-like base defense elements. Protect cores from massive enemy invasions by using abilities, a custom tech-loadout and building defense towers.

name: Ruffy and the Riverside
description: In Ruffy and the Riverside, you wield the magic power of SWAP, using it to Copy & Paste textures within the game world. Turn ice into lava or waterfalls into vines as you ride hay bales, explore, fight, and solve puzzles throughout Riverside. Unleash your imagination in this quirky open-world action game that literally lets you change the world!

name: Heart of Muriet
description: Unique voxel fantasy real-time strategy. Experience the land of Muriet and reunite your family in this epic real-time strategy game! It's a game for people who love RTS games, but intense micromanagement stops them from playing.

name: Bittersweet Birthday
description: Bittersweet Birthday is an action game where every combat encounter is a challenging and unique fight. You can also explore different areas and help many of the NPC populating them with their everyday struggles while learning more about the world and its history.

name: Little Sim World
description: Little Sim World is an indie Open World 2D Life Simulator with RPG and multiplayer elements that has been in development since early 2019 for the PC. Little Sim World is being made by Terry along with a few friends who have a passion towards the Sims genre.

name: Truck Mechanic: Dangerous Paths
description: Truck Mechanic: Dangerous Paths challenges you to transport huge variety of goods using your excellent driving skills, on South American wilderness. Contracts are getting more profitable as you get more reputation, each allowing you to improve your cash balance, upgrade or customize your truck. Take care, though, and watch the road, as accidents and involuntary pit stops cause more problems than simply making your clients mad. If you have no choice, just leave the cabin and make some temporary repairs, refuel frequently whenever possible.

name: Neyyah
description: Neyyah is a first-person point-and-click adventure game from solo developer, Aaron Gwynaire. You are thrown into a strange secretive world called Neyyah. Use careful observation and logic to uncover the mysteries entwined within Neyyah's peculiar landscapes and bizarre cultures.

name: Gun Miner
description: Gun Miner is a rogue-lite where you explore the ever-changing caves of a mysterious planet. Dig up treasure with your void-blaster rifle. Spend any loot you find on upgrades for your suit, for your gun, or for your ship. Yes you will die a lot, but each turn makes you a tiny bit more powerful.

name: Vertigo 2: Into the Aether
description: Into the Aether is a story expansion for Vertigo 2. Embark on an interdimensional expedition to the oldest and most mysterious universe, discover new weapons and tools, and defeat fearsome new enemies.

name: Only Arrows
description: You are a block. You move with arrow keys. Aspiration languishes in the factures of psyche.

name: Legend of Heroes: Three Kingdoms
description: "Legend of Heroes: Three Kingdoms" is a single-player RPG where you shape the Three Kingdoms era. Choose to be a ruler, a loyal advisor, or a cunning mercenary. Marry, build homes, or train in martial arts. Restore peace through diplomacy or conquer with mighty armies.

name: Unpatterned Cut
description: Sin descripción

name: Scarecrow Tactics
description: Sin descripción

name: Flesh Psychosis
description: Flesh Psychosis is a little casual puzzle game, in which you have to score as much as possible. You have to collect various spooky ingredients and make deathly meals, using gravity and mad scientist tools.

name: Store Empire
description: Build your own retail empire on a paradise island. Buy, manage, and expand your stores, attract customers with advertising, and adapt to unexpected events. Protect your business from thieves and dominate the market.

name: Sweep
description: SWEEP is a tactical turn-based card game. Use your cards and submachine gun to conquer dungeons! Stickers and items turn cards into bullets for devastating damage. Strategize, gain extra turns, and crush enemies with overwhelming firepower!

name: Ambidextro
description: A witch has kidnapped the prince and princess. As a royal wizard, it is your mission to rescue them both at the same time, but first you will have to learn to control your two bodies simultaneously.

name: Legacy of Sin: Ill-Boding
description: The world as we knew it no longer exists. Join the few remaining survivors, lead them, and build your city, feed your people and organize your defenses to survive the hordes of enemies attacking your kingdom, mankind's last kingdom, our hope. Can you turn a small village into a great realm?

name: Rain World: The Watcher
description: Rain World: The Watcher is an expansion of Rain World. Journey beyond to something, somewhere only ever glimpsed. When the world beneath your feet cracks and crumbles, will you hold on to all you once new? Or dive into the unknown?

name: Superhero Cats
description: Hidden Superhero Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this epic superhero environment! Test your attentiveness and relax in this cozy and free game

name: Gloom: System Breach
description: A 3D sci-fi action adventure game in which the player takes on the role of a small robot controlled from a third-person perspective. We wake up in a non-working system, help to activate it by activating individual systems and fight opponents who defend the necessary parts.

name: Two-Sided Runner
description: Sin descripción

name: Pet & Dog Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Banned Tapes
description: You are a filmmaker and recently purchased a box of VHS tapes at a flea market. Now you need to look through them and select tapes on which occur supernatural, violent, horrifying scenes...

name: Odessa
description: A retired bodyguard has to team up with an astute bunny-girl to keep the hope of rescuing his soon-to-be wife, abducted by mysterious individuals. At the same time, a cult around a strange goddess is developing. How could the two things be related? And will he be able to see his beloved one again?

name: 4X4 Progress
description: Choose your desired civilization, design your 4x4 cities with the most efficient layout, and advance your civilization! However, the layout is reset every turn.

name: Risk & Riches
description: This roguelite deckbuilder is set in the American West. Battle monsters, cultists, and folkloric creatures while searching for gold and the source of the evil within a mine. You choose when to leave, not where to go. Will you play it safe returning to the surface, or risk it all by going deeper?

name: BitRick's Venture
description: An action-roguelite with procedural generation.

name: The Running Toaster
description: Run like a Toaster! Collect slices of Bread and speed up by shooting Toast at the Vegetables!

name: Rescue Q
description: The objective of this “Top-Down puzzle action game” is to assist rescue workers in their movements until they can rush to a person in distress and rescue him or her. Various terrains and gimmicks will block your and the rescue team's way.

name: Care Bears: Unlock the Magic
description: Dive into a world of fun and adventure with the Care Bears in "Care Bears: Unlock the Magic" Play as Cheer Bear and her friends in a variety of arcade games!

name: Winning Post 10 2025
description: The "Winning Post" series, which celebrates its 30th anniversary in 2023, is an "authentic horse racing simulation game" in which players take on the role of an owner-breeder (horse owner and producer) and experience the drama of horses and people in the horse racing world.

name: Venus Vacation Prism: Dead or Alive Xtreme
description:
On this island, the moment of love.

The first ever full-fledged first-person adventure romance game in the DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme series, offering romantic encounters with six cute, charming girls!

name: Inayah: Life after Gods
description: Sin descripción

name: Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark
description: Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark is a 2D action adventure starring two new characters. Servants of the Dark takes the tight action players enjoyed in Gal Guardians: Demon Purge and vastly increases the exploration and collection elements, shifting genres completely to a full Metroidvania for an all-new experience.

name: Hitman World of Assassination
description: Sin descripción

name: Sports: Renovations
description: Give sports facilities a second life in this relaxing first-person simulator! Restore the glory of old gyms, courts and pitches as you try to make enough money to save your hometown basketball court.

name: Atomfall
description: A nuclear disaster has left an area of Britain in tatters. Atomfall, a new survival-action game, will see you explore, scavenge, craft, barter and fight your way through beautifully recreated scenery in search of answers.

name: As We Descend
description: The roguelike deckbuilder with the soul of a strategy game. Recruit, upgrade, and deploy your forces in tactical battles against corrupt creatures. Make hard decisions in humanity’s final city to bolster your odds. Will you break the cycle of endless descent?

name: The First Berserker: Khazan
description: The First Berserker: Khazan is a hardcore action role-playing game. The player will become Khazan, the great general of the Pelos empire, whom overcame death, and sets out to reveal the incidents that led to his downfall and seek vengeance on his enemies.

name: Your House
description: A narrative puzzle-thriller that blurs the lines between games and books, reality and fiction, puzzles and storytelling.

name: Wanderer: The Fragments of Fate
description: Step into the unknown and embark on an epic, time travel adventure, completely re-imagined. Introducing Wanderer: The Fragments of Fate, a remake of the critically acclaimed VR adventure game - Wanderer. There’s no telling where you’ll go and who you’ll become as you unravel the mysteries of time.

name: Bubble Ghost Remake
description: Guide a small ghost and its bubble through an enchanted castle full of dangers and challenges in this incredible remake of the popular classic "Bubble Ghost". With over 40 levels of skill that include ingenious puzzles and challenging obstacles, get ready for hours of addictive gameplay.

name: Which Way Up: Galaxy Games
description:
Which Way Up: Galaxy Games is a family friendly party game that gives unique freedom of movement by allowing you to run on walls and ceilings, orbit around planets, or fall across entire levels by manoeuvring through gravity fields.

Before The Universe existed, the Space Sprites banded together one-by-one to see a dream come to fruition: the dream of life itself. As The Universe began to take shape, so too did space. But space is unpredictable, and creating life is tiresome work. So, the Sprites took it upon themselves to create a pastime. The Galaxy Games.

Each event features its own unique bite-sized challenge where up to 4 players can compete. Eject your friends into space as you race across gravity fields, score a goal with an entire moon, leap across planets to escape a black hole, and capture and hold zodiacal constellations.

name: Ena: Dream BBQ
description: Experience surreal environments and inexplicable characters as ENA in a new wild world.

name: Karma: The Dark World
description: This is a first-person story-driven psychological horror game. Delve into this dark and strange world with an investigation officer from Roam to find traces of lost memories and fulfill your destiny.

name: Rosewater
description:
A thrilling wild west adventure set in the world of Lamplight City! Harley Leger and her ragtag posse embark on a harrowing journey across Western Vespuccia, facing bandits, rebels, ruthless oil barons, and many more obstacles on their quest for fame and riches.

Features
- A thrilling treasure hunt with 5 travel companions. How you treat and interact with them affects the story.
- Traditional adventure game puzzles (i.e. inventory-based) some with more than one solution.
- Fully rotoscoped animations, including cinematic closeups.
- High resolution 1280x720 graphics (yes, that's 720p!)
- Full music score by Mark Benis, featuring live instruments.
- Meet over 50 professionally voiced characters.

name: AI Limit
description: In the distant future when civilization is on the verge of extinction, people follow the legend of the Elysium in the last city, Havenswell. In this post-apocalyptic wasteland sci-fi ARPG, you will play as Arrisa, a Blader with immortality, and explore the city ruin to find the hope of a new life.

name: Kemono Heroes
description:
Kemono Heroes combines elements of run and gun, fast arcade action with dashes and slashes, with cool and fluffy characters. It can be enjoyed up to 4 Players in cooperative mode, fighting together and helping each other but is totally designed to work as a single player game as well.

Play solo, or share Joy-Con controllers for local multiplayer support for up to 4 players. With upgradeable weapons and items, and charming visuals drawn from retro side-scrollers and traditional folklore, Kemono Heroes is truly a vivid and memorable action adventure!

name: Jirai the Red Panda
description: Meet Jirai the Red Panda! Explore a world filled with cute pixel animals. Jirai the Red Panda is a game about friendship, exploration, and slime? In this pixel platformer game you'll have to run, jump and dash your way through challenging platforming levels and boss battles.

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extra Pack feat. ARU
description: Sin descripción

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.10 feat. V.I.P
description: Sin descripción

name: Cannonball Crew
description: Cannonball Crew is a fast-paced pirate multiplayer game blending capture-the-flag and treasure hunting. Teams scramble to seize treasures, hide them, and defend their stash. Imprison opponents, rescue teammates, and wield swords, harpoons, and cannons in this intense battle for pirate glory!

name: Mother Machine
description: Climb, jump, and explore alien caves full of emergent surprises in this 1-4 player co-op action-rpg platformer. Customize your cute chaos gremlin with a never-ending appetite for adventure & mayhem! Unlock a vast range of mutations to choose your preferred playstyle and role in a group.

name: Grit & Valor: 1949
description: Command an elite squad of Mechs in this alternate World War 2 dieselpunk real-time tactics roguelite. Think fast, battle the Evil Axis forces, and neutralise their HQ. Upgrade your Mechs and Pilots, and develop new strategies to defeat the enemy!

name: Ezrebeth
description: Ezrebeth is an old, bitter recluse who finds herself constantly invaded by her peculiar relatives during the winter holidays. Oh, and she's stuck in a time loop! Investigate, interview and cross-reference as you attempt to figure out what's going on in this surreal visual novel.

name: Paper 2: Origami Refolded
description: Fold your way through over 100 levels and become an origami master in this casual puzzle game suitable for all ages.

name: Spooky Survivors
description: Spooky Survivors puts you in the shoes of Van Hobo, a quirky hero battling the supernatural! Start with all unlocks BUT choose which to level up as you face endless waves. Equip powerful gear and unlock unique abilities. Outlast the nightmare and prove yourself as the ultimate spooky survivor!

name: Breakout Beyond
description: Breakout is back! In this neon-drenched take on the classic, you’ll need to literally break through each puzzle by clearing bricks to breach the final goal. Rack up a combo and create spectacular light shows alone or with a friend.

name: Killing Floor III: Day One Edition
description:
The Flatline Tactical Bundle; 'Flatliner' weapon skin, 'Fear the Reaper' weapon trinket and 'Special Action Force' player card. Also includes (retail exclusive) Clamefield Patrol Character Skins cosmetic DLC.

The Battle Begins With Nightfall

It’s 2091 and megacorp Horzine has produced the ultimate army: an obedient horde of bioengineered monstrosities called zeds. Now, only the rebel group Nightfall stands between these infernal creations and the future of humanity.

Killing Floor 3 is the next installment in the legendary action/horror series. This intense FPS puts you in the boots of a Nightfall specialist joining forces with up to five teammates to battle waves of zeds, earn dosh, unlock skills, and build the ultimate arsenal.

name: Frog Galaxy Survivor
description: Hi, it's Frogus! A nasty vortex has appeared in the sky and turned my frog friends and the Earth into puzzle pieces! Help me find them in these different space universes and platforms !

name: Travel On, Pigeon!
description: This is a puzzle-rhythm game about a tourist pigeon having a good time, with engaging challenges you can take at your own pace. Stroll through cute and nostalgic places and get with the flow in this chill and charming experience.

name: Sangokushi Taisen: Battle of Three Kingdoms
description:
KAI SANGOKUSHI TAISEN - Battle of Three Kingdoms - is a military card battle game set in the world of the arcade version of SANGOKUSHI TAISEN.

As part of the 'Volunteer Army' aiming to unify China, players will travel across the land, recruit warlords, and engage in epic battles.

name: Killing Floor III
description: It's 2091. Megacorporation Horzine has produced the ultimate army: an obedient horde of bioengineered monstrosities called "Zeds." Now, only the rebel group Nightfall stands between these infernal creations and the future of humanity.

name: The Darkest Files
description: The Darkest Files is a historical investigation and courtroom game based on true crimes of the Nazi era. Investigate cold cases, search for clues, interrogate witnesses, immerse the crimes and defend your case in court to bring the perpetrators to justice.

name: Bober Constructions
description: Bober k***w. Patrz jakie bydle! And even more than just one. 4 beaver-builders, and you can control one of them. Create structures, manage time and resources, watch out for obstacles, and remember, fast action is the key to success!

name: Atomfall: Deluxe Edition
description:
Pre-order the Atomfall Deluxe Edition to receive:
• The entire Atomfall game
• 3 days Early Access
• “Story Expansion Pack” – (*not available Day 1):
• “Basic Supply Bundle” Pack
• “Enhanced Supply Bundle” Pack

name: River Towns
description: Solve puzzles by placing buildings and creating vibrant cities in River Towns. Each district has its own style and shapes, making every level a new challenge. Help to restore and rebuild our River Towns.

name: The Deadly Path
description: A building management, tower defense game set in an occult dungeon. Create your dungeon, defend against raides and build the idol in order to bring your dark lord into being and bring about the age of reckoning.

name: QubiQuest: Castle Craft
description: QubiQuest: Castle Craft is a game where players build huge castles in an ancient war-torn world and defend them against hordes of enemies in chaotic siege battles of epic proportions. Castle Craft is a unique blend of voxel sandbox, action, and horde defence.

name: Herogue
description: This game fused turn-based game and roguelikes. You will play the role of the team leader, and build the team's skill genre by upgrading. Experiment with different characters and upgrade options to find your winning formula!

name: Mike goes on hike
description: Become a real tourist in Mike Goes on Hike! Amazing wild landscapes, inexpressible atmosphere of hiking and important vital lessons are waiting for you. Go all the way to the end to fulfill the request of your beloved grandfather.

name: Redemption of Liuyin
description: This is a 3D ancient style fantasy, multi ending action role-playing game. As the third installment of the Ryukyu Hidden series and the Ryukyu Hidden Nine Absolute Reincarnation Chapter, the game is designed with the principle of promoting offense and hesitation to defeat in its combat system.

name: Jar Head Cauldron
description: Fight monsters from the other side using magical items and weapons crafted in world in order to succeed. Use “In World Crafting” to upgrade weapons and solve puzzles in order to help save your dismembered brothers and sisters by completing the necromantic ritual before their souls are lost forever.

name: Atelier Yumia: "Super Cute! Beach Memories" Costume for Isla
description: Sin descripción

name: Atelier Yumia: "Knight's Long-Distance Swimwear" Costume for Viktor
description: Sin descripción

name: Atelier Yumia: "Ebony Outlaw" Costume for Rutger
description: Sin descripción

name: Atelier Yumia: "Cute Kitty Swimsuit" Costume for Lenja
description: Sin descripción

name: Atelier Yumia: "Blooming Heart" Costume for Nina
description: Sin descripción

name: Atelier Yumia: Aladiss Investigation Preparation Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land - Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Y.M.C.A.
description: Aliens are invading! Load up your guns and eliminate them with the help of ancient indigenous equipment in your backpack!

name: Box #341
description: A quirky box on a journey to find its place in the warehouse, using liquids to gain abilities, solve puzzles, and make new friends on the way!

name: Galactic Vanguard
description: Galactic Vanguard is a fast-paced, retro-style action shooter. Grab your weapons and eliminate relentless enemy forces and powerful alien creatures. Engage in intense battles across space bases, desert wastelands, lava valleys, and abandoned alien ruins!

name: Tracktopia
description: Tracktopia is a strategy game with city-building elements, where your city moves on tracks and serves as a super powerful unit. Expand it to boost production, advance technologies, and create smaller units to ultimately defeat the enemy nation!

name: Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land
description:
In a world where alchemy is deemed "taboo", the alchemist Yumia yearns for the "truth" that lies hidden in the ruined continent.
Now, she takes her first steps on a grand adventure across the continent─

name: Bleach: Rebirth of Souls
description: Awaken the blade within you and reverse your fate in BLEACH Rebirth of Souls! Engage in thrilling battles with powerful sword abilities and characters from this legendary anime franchise.

name: Photobia: Tales from the Dark
description: Immerse yourself in the dark and mysterious universe of Photobia: Tales from the Dark, where intricate light-based puzzles await. Use physics to overcome obstacles and bring light to the heart of this enigmatic world.

name: Can't Sleep!
description: This game is a Single Player Rougelike Deckbuilder includes 1 playable character. Player's goal is to reduce their soberness at Night by spending time to play cards. Player can also use stamina joining Activities to gain more cards and advantages at the Daytime after every Night.

name: Yasuke Simulator
description: Step into 1579 as Yasuke, the African samurai, and join Oda Nobunaga in his quest to unite Japan! Master precise katana combat, uncover secret gear, and unleash your ancestral power in this historically inspired action-packed journey through feudal Japan.

name: Palm Cracker
description: Delve into a gripping world of puzzles, true ciphers on an old PalmPilot system. Will you uncover the Crypt Killer’s confession and bring him to justice, or will he escape the law?

name: House of Lost Souls
description: A long-standing pain has driven Jack back to the old family home in search of answers. Discover the terrible truth this house held and how it relates to what happened to his parents in the distant past.

name: Orc Hunter: Elven Archers VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Jumble Quest
description: Tap, scramble letters, and solve the clues! How many hidden words can you find?!

name: Into the Zone
description:
Dominate the Goal Zone: Outlast your rivals and seize control to score. It’s not about kills—it’s about relentless control.
Engage in electrifying 1v1 duels, coordinate devastating team assaults, or unleash chaos in massive multi-team brawls! Every round is a wild, skill-testing party you won't want to miss. Easy to pick up, impossible to put down—this is a party game from another dimension!

name: Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition
description:
The year is 2054. Earth has been destroyed by an intergalactic war between two alien races, and humanity is on the brink of annihilation. A small number of survivors, aboard the USS White Whale, crash land on the vast and untamed planet Mira—and now it falls to you, as a member of BLADE, to help bring humanity back from the edge of extinction…with the aid of powerful giant robots called Skells!

The visually enhanced edition of this open-world RPG contains newly added story elements and more.

Take on tough foes in a robust combat system, and pilot powerful giant robots called Skells

Choose from a huge variety of special attacks, skills, and classes in a combat system that’s as deep as you want it to be. Once you’ve proven yourself to BLADE, you’ll earn the right to pilot and personalize your very own Skell—a powerful machine that can fly, transform into a vehicle for fast overland travel, and wield immense strength in combat with customizable weapons and armor.

Gather resources and take on missions to build the community of New Los Angeles

As you go about the reconstruction effort, getting to know the people of New Los Angeles (NLA), you’ll build affinity with your party members and unlock quests for gear and other rewards. Join your choice of military organization within BLADE to take on even more missions—or even team up with up to 32 players from near and far online* in Squad Tasks, Online Missions, and extra-challenging Global Nemesis Battles!

name: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Gold Edition
description:
Experience an epic historical action-adventure story set in feudal Japan! Become a lethal shinobi Assassin and a powerful legendary samurai as you explore a beautiful open world in a time of chaos. Switch seamlessly between two unlikely allies as you discover their common destiny and usher in a new era for Japan.

Explore the captivating open world of feudal Japan, from spectacular castle towns and bustling ports to peaceful shrines and war-ravaged landscapes. Adventure through unpredictable weather, changing seasons, and reactive environments.

Become Naoe, a shinobi Assassin, and Yasuke, a legendary samurai, as you experience their riveting stories and master their complementary playstyles. As Naoe, use stealth to avoid detection and agility to confound your enemies. As Yasuke, strike your foes with lethal precision and power. Unlock new skills, gear, and progression independently for each character.

Make information your weapon as you explore the world, and build your own network of spies to be your eyes and ears across locations to hunt down your next target. Along the way, recruit new allies with unique abilities to help accomplish your missions.

Create a fully customizable hideout for your growing shinobi league as you train your crew, craft new gear, interact with key characters, and choose your base’s layout, decorations, and accessories.

name: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Thrown to the Dogs
description: Thrown to the Dogs is a downloadable content pre-order expansion package for Assassin's Creed: Shadows that is expected to release alongside the main game. It will involve helping a loyal dog avenge his late master.

name: Assassin's Creed Shadows
description: Experience an epic historical action-adventure story set in feudal Japan! Become a lethal shinobi Assassin and a powerful legendary samurai as you explore a beautiful open world in a time of chaos. Switch seamlessly between two unlikely allies as you discover their common destiny. Master complementary playstyles, create your shinobi league, customize your hideout, and usher in a new era for Japan.

name: Vagrient
description: Play as Vagrient in this sci-fi action/adventure game full of exploration, combat, character progression and puzzle solving!

name: Frog Island
description: Frog Island is a fully hand-drawn, cozy Frog Collection and Life-Sim game. Take care of adorable frogs, grow crops, cook meals, place toys and decorations, and uncover the secrets of Frog island!

name: Dye the Bunny
description: Dye the Bunny is an Easter horror game about little Ellie going on an Easter Egg Hunt down a rabbit hole.

name: Mudborne
description: Mudborne is a casual nature management sim about discovering & breeding frogs! Awoken from hibernation you find your pond abandoned. Through the genetic keys of new species you must unlock the paths between the waking & dreaming worlds, and embark on a journey to restore lost populations.

name: Rendering Ranger: R² [Rewind]
description: You are the Rendering Ranger, a special forces soldier who defending Earth from a devastating alien invasion through nine levels of action platforming as well as blisteringly fast horizontal shooter stages. Originally developed for Super Famicom by Manfred Trenz, creator of the Turrican series.

name: Octohill Ski Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Trailer Park Tycoon: Raccoon Ranch
description: One of the key elements of the game is your production. However, instead of the usual vegetables, pies, and trinkets, you're engaged in growing tobacco, brewing alcohol, and producing goods available only to adults. In addition, you can produce coffee, soda, and energy drinks. All of this can be sold in your store!

name: Steinstern
description: Retro Space Action Shooter with RPG elements. Fight alone or together local couch coop! Prove your skills with many different weapons and several spaceships with different weapon layouts!

name: TechnoSorcery
description: TechnoSorcery is a rhythm arcade game with a focus on memorizing spells and casting them to a beat. Help the fledgling Sorcerer Aiden as he embarks on an impossible adventure of revenge. Show off your skills Online in 1v1 card battles with your own custom deck of cards.

name: MLB The Show 25: Digital Deluxe Edition Bonus Content
description: Sin descripción

name: MLB The Show 25
description: Forge your baseball journey in The Show

name: The Tau Experiment
description: The Tau Experiment is an episodic RPG Adventure game where you play as Sam, an employee with the Tau Corporation. Choose your own adventure as you work to help Sam put an end to the company's plans.

name: Pathologic 3: Quarantine
description: Pathologic 3: Quarantine is a narrative-driven adventure about a young scientist in search of immortality and a mysterious plague outbreak in a small town. Learn how your story began and what drove a celebrated academic to leave his acclaimed lab. Examine patients, uncover strange secrets, and make first steps towards defeating Death.

name: Chaos Caster
description: Cast spells, dash around hordes of enemies, and assemble powerful combos as you explore procedurally generated dungeons. Chaos Caster is an action roguelike focused on strategy, playstyle variety, and replayability.

name: Teleport Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Wanted: Dead or Alive
description: Step into the Wild West with Wanted: Dead or Alive, a fast-paced puzzle game that will put your observation skills to the test. Your mission: spot the wanted outlaw among a crowd of ever-moving cowboys. As you progress, the challenge intensifies—time speeds up, and a single mistake could cost you your bounty. With its simple yet addictive gameplay, Wanted: Dead or Alive will push your reflexes and focus to the limit. Can you catch all the bandits before they vanish into the crowd?

name: Public Transport Simulator 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Horg's Brewery
description: Foul-mouthed dwarves brewing beer and blasting enemies with rifles in the darkness.

name: Keep Deep Sheep
description: Some sheep in your flock require veterinary care. Unfortunately, these visits are not their favorite, making them unruly and difficult to handle. This arcade game calls for cleverness, dexterity but without any time pressure. Perfect for anyone who appreciates a dose of good humor.

name: Faun Town
description: Faun Town is a relaxing automation-building puzzle game. After crash-landing on a mysterious island and losing your memory, you must use the island's resources to build automated production lines and repair your ship.

name: Wine Factory Simulator
description: Grow, Harvest, Create – The Art of Winemaking Awaits!

name: God's Disdain
description: Sin descripción

name: MLB The Show 25: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: WWE 2K25
description: Celebrate The Bloodline in Showcase. Compete online in MyGM. Expanded gameplay includes intergender wrestling, chain wrestling, barricade diving, the return of Promos + much more!

name: Out of the Park Baseball 26
description: 26 years of sports gaming excellence! Out of the Park Baseball 26 is here - officially licensed by MLB, the MLB Players Inc., and KBO! This year's brand new version puts you firmly in charge of your favorite baseball franchise. Your team, your way, your rules.

name: Neva: Devolver Deluxe Edition
description:
Neva: Devolver Deluxe will include the following exclusive items, besides the physical game:
· A stunning softbound 88-page artbook showcasing concept art and game art.
· A copy of the game’s original soundtrack by Berlinist, on a CD and as digital download.
· A collector’s tuck-in box housing all the contents.

Neva is an emotionally charged action-adventure from the team behind GRIS.

name: Pachinko TD
description: Pachinko TD is a physics-based, minimalist tower defense game. Inspired by Thronefall.

name: Chumini: Tiny Army
description: In this vampire survivor-like, summon an army of tiny Chuminis to battle waves of forest demons. Each Chumini has its own movement patterns: it's up to you to manage this merry mess to create an unstoppable force!

name: Kaleidoscope of Phantasm Prison 2
description: A reunion of old middle school friends in a room resembling something from an Alice in Wonderland world. With chains and collars around the girls' necks.

name: Break Wolf
description: An Adventure RPG that deals with the life and death of wayward humans, striving to escape a syndicate that creates monsters.

name: Grimm's Folly
description:
In Grimm’s Folly, find yourself falling through a wormhole and landing in a trash heap. The world around you, dark and unfamiliar, is not your own. Someone has trapped you here. And that someone doesn’t ever want you to leave.

Grimm's Folly is a first person adventure puzzle game with a twist. Not only do you control the main character but you can also control a raven to help you explore the available areas, collect unique collectable and even fly through the game in 20 time trials.

name: Heat or Die
description: Survive extreme cold and a Wendigo stalker, hunting it to avoid being hunted. A game focused on survival, exploration, non-linear gameplay, and a terrifying atmosphere.

name: Broad Sword
description:
Broad Sword is a formation based third-person tactical hack and slash game where you lead formations of troops to face off against a variety of factions in a fantasy realm. Engage in class-based combat as you defeat your foes in conquest, siege and campaign modes.

Fight from a ground level view of large fantasy battles, command your formation of troops, and lead your army through hack-and-slash encounters to claim ultimate victory! Go head to head in objective based conquest mode. Test your defensive skills in a wave based survival mode, or employ grand strategy in a campaign mode. Varied troop types offer distinct fighting styles and weapons, allowing for diverse playstyles and tactics. Will you anchor a battle line with spearmen, shatter defenses with mighty great swords, or rain arrows upon your enemies?

name: Hike Haven
description: Sin descripción

name: Foepower
description: Roguelite single character auto-battler - level up, gear up, and chill with the semi-idle gameplay

name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - The Rat Who Demons Fear
description: Sin descripción

name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - The Girl Who Cried Ghost
description: Sin descripción

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - The Chapter of Seign
description: Sin descripción

name: Cashier Simulator
description: Grocery Store Manager

name: Moorhuhn Kart 4
description: The world's craziest chicken is heading back to the racetrack! Wacky characters, cool tracks and karts, and zany items await in a worldwide online battle for first place!

name: After Death
description: After Death is a police horror videogame based on real events, where the fate of Bisman is in your hands. Prosecutor Bisman is murdered, next to his body there is only his ghost, without memories, wanting to solve the mystery of his own death. Meanwhile, the Reaper is on the prowl...

name: Jin & Jan
description: Jin & Jan: A ghostly puzzle game for two minds but only one player. Control two brothers, Jin and Jan, on a spooky adventure. Jin does what you say, but Jan always does the opposite! Master their unique movements to solve mind-bending puzzles and overcome obstacles in a ghostly world.

name: Splort
description: Use your elastic hand to climb, push and fight your friends in this intense local multiplayer physics-based combat mayhem, across countless levels, with a huge variety of unique weapons at your disposal.

name: Ringo's Roundup
description: Solve grid-based puzzles, guide Postbunny Ringo's car through a variety of environments and collect all the scattered envelopes in this cute pathfinding puzzle game!

name: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Myth: Fulland of Water and Light
description: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Myth: Fulland of Water and Light is an upcoming game from Bushiroad Games.

name: Kamitsubaki City Regenerate
description: Answer the summons to the parallel world of "Kamitsubaki City" and meet a cast of colorful characters as you set out on a quest to save this city from the brink of destruction in this dark-fantasy sci-fi visual novel!

name: Matcho
description: Connect everything in this revolutionary Match-3 FPS with combat mechanics different from anything you've ever played before. Join Max and his friends on an epic journey as he takes on a mysterious alien invasion that could lead to curing his illness and saving the Earth.

name: Nightmare Of SilkenCore: Train Hell
description: Nightmare Of SilkenCore - Train Hell Step into the shoes of a journalist sent to a remote island to investigate a terrifying anomaly. Armed with a makeshift vehicle, you must collect four mysterious artifacts while avoiding Blinky, a malevolent living train, and other deadly creatures.

name: Falling for Yaoguais
description: Drama! Crisis! And four charming or adorable Taiwanese Yaoguai(supernatural beings) love interests! Over 150 choices lead you through a romantic adventure—who will you choose? Or... will you choose them all?

name: Play Twice
description: "Enjoy Twice" – A new Sokoban-style puzzle game, Play Twice! Once you clear a stage, a second playthrough begins on the same board. Enjoy a dual-layered puzzle experience where strategic planning for the second round is the key to success!

name: Bitball
description: Sin descripción

name: Doggos in Dungeon
description: Reclaim your dungeon through tactical combat in this dungeon crawling adventure to become the best Doggo.

name: Expelled!
description: A School Prefect has been pushed out of a window, and everyone's blaming YOU. Can you find the culprit - or someone to take the fall - before you get EXPELLED? Mystery with a wicked twist, from the creators of Overboard! and A Highland Song.

name: Be Brave, Barb
description: Sin descripción

name: Day Zero
description: Can you survive a zombie apocalypse? Day Zero is a text-based survival game where choices determine fate and ethical and moral decisions matter. Every choice shapes the story. Are you ready to test your limits in a zombie apocalypse?

name: Cipheur
description: Sin descripción

name: Gretel's Honesty
description: A comic-like visual novel, expressing a new story based on the fairy tale “Hansel and Gretel”.

name: Wind Breaker: Furyou-tachi no Eiyuutan
description: An RPG based on the anime 'Wind Breaker'. Features the voice cast of the anime reprising their roles.

name: Fate: Reawakened
description: Revisit the quaint town of Grove and the realms beyond as you prepare to enter the Dungeon Gate once again! The award-winning FATE series has gotten a modern facelift while remaining true to the nostalgic dungeon crawler classic.

name: Adulting
description: Growing older has nothing to do with feeling grown up. Face the challenges of adulthood with Liv, Albert and Finja in this interactive visual novel by exploring their everyday lives through point-and-click interactions as well as mini games and figure out the secrets of how to be an adult!

name: Witchroid Vania: A Magical Girl’s Fantastical Adventures
description: Join mage-in-training Lily on an epic adventure! Explore a multitude of worlds, including forests, deserts, and dungeons, in hopes of becoming a full-fledged mage!

name: Metal Bringer
description: In this roguelike action-adventure, control humanoid "Labor" and giant "Arms" to uncover the mysteries of the world. Create fully-customizable robots, strengthen them, and take down hordes of enemies!

name: Birdfull
description: Birdfull is a small relaxing idle game. Attract birds with feed, try to keep them longer, and discover all of them including the unique ones! Watch the birds, generate more eggs in real time, and customize your cozy bird space.

name: Swingularity
description: An indie space golf game set across an infinite multiverse filled with stylized planets, stars, and other celestial wonders. Bogey, par, or birdie your way through tailored and procedurally generated courses. In Swingularity, the cosmos becomes your fairway.

name: MeMic
description: MeMic is an atmospheric stealth game with horror elements, where you take on the role of a mimic, able to disguise yourself as everyday objects.

name: The Wind's Path
description: The Wind's Path is a fast-paced top down singleplayer game. If you want to stay alive, keep moving. A mysterious force is wreaking havoc in other worlds and only you can stop it. You'll unlock powerful wind abilities that not only make you a force of nature but help you fly through difficult levels.

name: Monster Trucking
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Trash
description: Years into a brutal lockdown, a once-thriving city lies in ruins, abandoned by its government and overrun by vicious, mindless infected. Grab your hammer, collect your nerves and enter the mayhem.

name: Wanderstop
description: From the creator of The Stanley Parable and The Beginner’s Guide comes Wanderstop, a narrative-centric cozy game about change and tea.

name: Centum
description: An unreliable narrative-driven adventure game. You are trapped, and you must escape. But is that really the goal?

name: Who Wears The Crown?
description: Test your brain and your brawn in the toughest chess game ever made! Play against a tough chess engine to build your path and climb upward to claim the crown, but be careful! One small blunder and you risk losing your progress. Heavy is the head that wears the crown, but who will wear it?

name: Oblin Party
description: A wacky physics-based, couch/online party brawler where the hands do the talking. Utilize your elastic arms to wield powerful items, or swing, slingshot, grab, and punch to catapult your opponents off the map. Perfect for quick, hilarious multiplayer sessions with friends!

name: JusTD
description: Tower Defense with resource- and base management! Waves of enemy robots with special abilities, shield and armor! Mining, refining and production for building and repairing! Environmental hazards and the best: the Orbital strike!

name: Argebe
description: A deliberately simplistic strategy game about equal opportunities and outplaying your opponents with stone cold logic

name: Fish-Click Squad!
description: Fish-Click Squad! is a casual multiplayer idler where you purchase various aquatic creatures and nurture them to maturity with your friends through clicking and touching earning coins and rewards to unlock more fish and idle features! There is nothing happier than slacking with friends!

name: Kitten Food Alley
description: Sin descripción

name: Demon Hunters
description: Sin descripción

name: Cheaters Cheetah
description: Everyone will be given ACTUAL CHEATS in this multiplayer shooter. Use wallhacks and aimbots to your advantage and dominate the other cheetahs. The winner will get to BAN all losers!

name: The Stepfather Remake
description:
Welcome to the 1920s, an era of jazz, speakeasies, and gangsters with more ambition than brains. In this classic point-and-click adventure, you’ll step into the shoes of Aurelliot, a down-on-his-luck private detective who, drowning in debt and short on clients, takes on a case that seems simple… until it isn’t.

What starts with a mysterious woman and a suspicious job spirals into a tangled web of blackmail, secrets, and absurd situations, where every conversation could hold the key and every object might (or might not) be useful. Inept gangsters, nosy bartenders, and a slew of puzzles await you in this remastered version of the 2003 classic—now with enhanced graphics, a remastered soundtrack, and brand-new voice acting for an even more immersive experience.

name: Broken Sword Collection
description: Paris in the fall holds many memories for George Stobbart: of cafés, of music, of love, and of death. Now on Evercade, you can explore the first two adventures in this legendary series, presented in their original 32-bit console form.

name: Indie Heroes Collection 4
description: The Indie Heroes return to Evercade with another lineup of new games made for (and in the style of) vintage gaming hardware. Includes the dig-and-bomb ’em up action of Murtop, the inimitable bouncy platforming of Flea!2, Batty Zabella’s saucy adventures and many more!

name: Beyond the Ice Palace II
description: A sequel to 1988's action platform game Beyond the Ice Palace released on Commodore 64.

name: Aneurism IV
description: An immersive multiplayer industrial nightmare simulator where you will be forced to work in a dystopian city on the verge of rotting. Pick a side, do your job, and don't ask questions.

name: Typing Ninja
description: Typing Ninja is an upcoming fast-paced typing game where players type falling words before they hit the ground, featuring Arcade and Story options. Players can use power-ups, face challenging bosses, and customize keycaps.

name: CraftCraft: Fantasy Merchant Simulator
description: CraftCraft is an RPG merchant sim with actual. Crafting. Create a tiara for a mermaid princess or a sword made of dragon blood - you choose! Express your creativity in your very own cozy crafting studio and change the lives of quirky locals in the mysterious port town of Windspell.

name: Turtle Riders: Adventure Begins
description: Ride giant turtles and aim your weapons at hordes of enemies chasing you while you gather as many resources as you can. Pick your upgrades carefully and create strong builds to survive the long road to the Outpost!

name: Thousand Lantern Lane
description: On a dreary, rainy night, you and your girlfriend find yourselves lost in a desolate Japanese-style town. The streets are empty, with only the sound of rain tapping against old tiles and stone pavements. It is said that this town harbors ancient secrets.

name: Hirai Nya
description: Step into a combat-free Metroidvania world where your adventure revolves around exploration, puzzle-solving, and treasure hunt.

name: The Adventures of Badgersaw: Chapter 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Macro Data Refinement Simulator: Shapes
description: The game is a Macro Data Refinement terminal simulator with installed a puzzle game - Shapes. This is the favorite game of the assistant director of the Macro Data Refinement Department, in which the goal is to arrange successive layers of the same shapes. Will you be able to beat Miss H's record?

name: No.8 High School
description: You've returned to your high school classroom, where time seems to stand still. You need to look around and find something unusual to get through the last 30 days of school.

name: Dead Beats Survivors
description: A 2D shooting survivor game! Survive in a dark, zombie-infested underground disco and earn money!

name: Myrmidon
description: Invite a friend online and embark on a puzzle-platformer adventure exploring the bond between an animator and his puppet. Work together to clear obstacles across the sprawling sets of a stop-motion animation workshop and find out to what lengths the power of imagination can take you.

name: Paws and Whiskers
description: Sin descripción

name: Ladies I'm Ready
description: The player becomes Samuel, uses the first-person perspective to immerse himself in meeting two beauties, and embarks on a joyful and sweet love journey with them. Two girls with different personalities, and it is up to you to decide who will go to the end with you.

name: Dream Life in the Country Side
description: Sin descripción

name: Braise
description: Sin descripción

name: Bolide
description: Sin descripción

name: FarmTD
description: FarmTD combines the charm of farming with the strategy of tower defense. Utilize and upgrade your animals to fend off invading insects while managing your crops to prevent them from dying of dehydration (or being eaten by hungry goats...)

name: Scarlet: City of Devils
description: A demon-punk hack-and-slash adventure game! Explore the city of Elovelle at your own discretion and take down the toughest thugs this game has to offer.

name: Into Death and Beyond
description: Into Death and Beyond is a gripping first-person survival horror game set on the hostile planet XB32-ENT. As bounty hunter Mark Helkins, scavenge for resources, solve puzzles, and confront terrifying mutants. Unravel dark secrets and capture a rogue alien before it hunts you down. Will you survive?

name: Ultimate Soccer
description: Ultimate skills to shoot, attack and run to mix combat gameplay with a skill-based soccer game in third person perspective! Show how you kick the shot to other players and become an Ultimate soccer player, gates awaiting to explode with your amazing goals!

name: Golden Knight
description: Defeat the forces of darkness and bring peace back to the kingdom of Valerond in this action-packed mini metroidvania.

name: Warm Monkey
description: Warm Monkey is an Action/Platformer video game in isometric 3D landscape. In a modern architectural and exotic city, a monkey multiplies and its need for water increases. He must reach the seashore.

name: Trolls vs. Vikings: Reborn
description: Strategy meets mischief! Explore an amazing and lush fantasy world, where an epic battle between Trolls, Vikings and the Nordic Gods rages on. Get ready to don your tactical horns and dive into Trolls vs Vikings: Reborn where strategy is king, trolls reign supreme,and your sanity is the final boss!

name: My Virtual Friend
description: My Virtual Friend is a desktop pet/idler game where a cute girl accompanies you whilst you navigate your computer. She's interested in what you're doing and will do her best to cheer you up! Play with her, unlock new backgrounds, and customize your outfits. Just don't make her mad...

name: Overtime Anomaly
description: You're working overtime again in your dead-end job, whilst your boss is on vacation. However, strange things are happening throughout the office. Complete your daily work tasks, explore your office, report any anomalies you may find, and you may just find yourself getting a promotion...

name: Yoshima: Hentai Simulator
description: Yoshima: Hentai Simulator is a 2D game with a lot of mechanics. It is always exhausting to look for apartment, but fortune is at your side now! Welcome your new roommate, Yoshima! Can you find the key to her heart? Don't forget to pay the rent!

name: Stick Tongue
description: Hello, I'm Frogus! Humans have ruined the Earth and depleted its resources. My plan? Climb to heaven with my tongue and ask God to make it rain!

name: Nubby's Number Factory
description: A plinko-style roguelike where you work at a number factory. Launch your spherical friend, Nubby, down a pegboard to make bigger and bigger numbers! But beware, if you fail to meet your number quota, the sun will explode.

name: Crimsonwood
description: Crimsonwood is a roguelike top-down shooter in a cursed national park. Collect various weapons, gain perks and battle hordes of enemies to survive. Play solo or online co-op.

name: Same Room Same Day
description: Step into the mind of Rosaline in this psychological horror FPS. Face terrifying manifestations of her fears, battle through intense combat, and help her find inner peace. Solve puzzles along the way to unlock deeper layers of her psyche and bring her closer to healing

name: Material Evidence
description: Clean up the streets in this hard-hitting action platformer! Enter a gritty saga of three complex individuals, each driven by their own motives and vices, their paths intersecting in unexpected and violent ways.

name: Oyasumii
description: Relive the nostalgia with Oyasumii, a horror and exploration game inspired by PSX and N64 classics. Enter liminal spaces and face surreal terrors in an adventure that challenges your skills and sanity. Are you ready to relive the golden age of video games with Oyasumii?

name: Moonbase Lambda
description: Moonbase Lambda is a horror survival game which you have to escape from a procedurally-generated maze. The premise of the game is that an unidentified creature breaks into the moonbase, which leaves you no choice but to survive and escape from it.

name: Mars Vice
description: Mars Vice is a narrative adventure game set on a distant and futuristic Mars. Follow two civil investigators, Dax and Anaya, as they root out deep-seated corruption in the Martian city of Pavonis in this biopunk-infused story.

name: MiniMania
description: MiniMania is a social MMO designed for browsers and mobile devices, offering a seamless gaming experience on the go. Explore a vibrant virtual world where you can build, customize, and create your own unique spaces. Connect with players worldwide, embark on exciting adventures, and discover endless fun through creative interactions and activities. Dive into MiniMania and make the world your playground!

name: Control Room
description: The game is a simple 2D platform action game with roguelite elements.You play a game in a certain room. You can avoid enemies from all around you and survive for 5 minutes to clear the game. You have to control various events, and every time you start the game you will discover something new.

name: Peachy Derby: Mephisto - Demon Maid

name: Through the Edges
description:
Step into a world divided by the enigmatic Spheres, where different races live under strict balance – a balance that has never been questioned… until now.

As the protagonist, an ordinary young person from a remote village, you receive an unexpected invitation to a grand ball. What seems like a stroke of fate soon turns into a revelation of hidden anomalies, ancient powers, and a secret that could shatter reality itself.

But you are not alone.

Meet intriguing characters from various races, each carrying their own secrets, struggles, and desires. Will they become your allies, rivals, or something more? Your choices will shape their destinies – and your own.

name: Buffet Knight: Decadent Full Course
description: Gobble up everything around you in this hungry action adventure as Buffet Knight. Battle monsters, conquer puzzling dungeons, save the culinary world! The more you eat, the stronger you grow... But will you end up biting off more than you can chew?

name: Cosmic Arcade Tycoon
description: Welcome to Cosmic Arcade Tycoon! Build your own Arcade in this tiny, cozy and casual sci-fi simulation! Unlock new objects, customize your layout and welcome cute alien visitors to create a flourishing entertainment hub!

name: Dead of Night: Supermarket
description: Experience the dread of a midnight shift in a quiet supermarket. As mundane tasks blur with eerie events, discover that the darkness hides more than just silence.

name: Circuit Maze
description: Tower defense without combat. Circuit Maze is a puzzle game where you need to build the longest possible maze with the resources you are given.

name: The Night of Escape
description: The Night of Escape" is an indie game personally crafted with themes of fear, escape, and decryption. Players take on the role of an escapee, constantly dodging danger and utilizing clues found to survive and flee. The game adopts a first-person perspective, immersing you in the experience.

name: Rabbit Trail
description: Wake up in a magical forest... as a rabbit. Something strange has happened to you, and solving it won’t be easy. Explore fascinating worlds, face challenging puzzles, and unravel the mystery of how you lost your human form. Each jump brings you closer to the truth... Are you ready to discover it?

name: Rogue Conflict
description: Rogue Conflict is a turn-based strategy roguelike. Combining tactical wargame combat with procedural roguelike features, Rogue Conflict is a game made for both wargamers and general turn based game enthusiasts alike.

name: Tiny Dangerous Dungeons Remake
description: Guide Timmy the little treasure hunter through traps and puzzles to reach the legendary treasure. This classic mini metroidvania is remade with new visuals, music, and content.

name: Aery: Dream Land
description: Escape the daily hustle, feel the freedom of flying, and immerse yourself in beautiful, peaceful landscapes.

name: Dark Passion: Anime Match Puzzles
description: Discover Dark Passion - Anime Match Puzzles! Match tiles to reveal stunning anime art and immerse yourself in mystery.

name: Poltergeist Prodigy
description:
Poltergeist Prodigy is a single-player, story-focused, puzzle action-adventure game, a first person haunter where you delight in being a mischievous ghost.

You are a new ghost, and to continue existing and uncover how you died you must haunt the living. With guidance from a comedic, more experienced ghost, you will learn to haunt people and animals with a variety of techniques in a range of places. By throwing objects around, conjuring scary aspects, possessing people, and ultilising many more haunting abilities, you will scare your way to becoming a more powerful spirit and trigger memories of how you died and the mysterious circumstances behind it.

name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Gangneung City
description: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!

name: Angry Battalion
description: Sin descripción

name: Ever 17 Never 7 Double Pack
description: Stand up to the fate of infinity!

name: Suikoden II HD Remaster: Dunan Unification War
description: Remaster of the second Suikoden game, released as part of the Suikoden I & II HD Remaster: Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars bundle.

name: Suikoden I HD Remaster: Gate Rune War
description: Remaster of the first Suikoden game, released as part of the Suikoden I & II HD Remaster: Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars bundle.

name: Star Life
description:
Sandbox "Zero To Hero" RPG in futuristic setting. Game features deep economic gameplay with realistic economy and full freedom for a player.

While on a planet, range of opportunities is wide, from being employed practically at any building (should there be a vacancy) to owning any non-government building, influencing economy directly. Entire planet economy is based on real buildings present in the game and therefore player can shape it to his liking (if player is rich enough). Player can also choose to be anyone - from local business owner, to criminal or politician (or as it might often be - all at once). Skill development is only possible if player performs tasks which require those skills.

Player can travel from planet to planet and own or rent any spaceship, mining, pirating or simply trading goods between planets. While game has no quests & restrictions, there is a main story present which implies that player need to achieve certain results and actions to meet win condition, which does not stop player from continuing game thereafter.

Choose any path or all at once. Model employee, Business owner, Politician, Merchant, Pirate, Criminal, or just explore game as it feels.

name: Split Fiction
description: Embrace mind-blowing moments as you’re pulled deep into the many worlds of Split Fiction, a boundary-pushing co-op adventure.

name: Do No Harm
description: A Doctor Simulator with a Lovecraftian twist. Diagnose patients by analyzing unsettling symptoms and treat them using your Book of Medicine. Make moral choices — decide who to save or kill, discover whom to trust, and unlock multiple endings! Can you endure 30 days of perilous decisions?

name: Never 7: The End of Infinity
description: An upcoming remastered version of Never7: The End of Infinity for PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch and PC.

name: Ever 17: The Out of Infinity
description: An upcoming remastered version of Ever17 for PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch and PC.

name: Bao Bao's Cozy Laundromat
description: Relax in Bao Bao’s Cozy Laundromat, an idle game where you join Bao Bao, a charming panda, in creating the coziest laundromat. Purchase colorful washing machines, add delightful decorations, and hire panda helpers. Watch your cozy laundromat bustle with life, even when you’re not around!

name: Flight Simulator Pro 2024
description: Sin descripción

name: MainFrames
description: MainFrames invites you to meet Floppy and to browse a clever and charming platformer that plays out entirely within the windows and desktop of a PC monitor. You won’t want to press the escape key on this cozy outing!

name: Lovesick
description: After a grueling tour that has left them drained and flat broke, a struggling post-punk band returns home. The group is already on the brink of collapse when a supernatural event dubbed “the Feedback” plunges them all into a twisted alternate reality.

name: FragPunk
description:
FragPunk is the new free-to-play 5v5 hero shooter poised to break the rules of combat.
What makes FragPunk different is the introduction of Shard Cards that can affect the playing field for all players.
Shard Cards are voted on by players before each round and can change the entire playing field – from making player’s heads big to your team into zombies when you are downed.
FragPunk has a low barrier entry but a high-level of gunplay mechanics making it a great choice for casual gamers to hardcore FPS fans alike.

name: Parallel Experiment
description: Dive into the secrets of the Parallel Experiment in this 2-player co-op puzzle game. Join forces as two detectives to finally catch the infamous Cryptic Killer. And remember - communication is key!

name: Morkull: Ragast's Rage
description: A 2D video game that combines platforming and action with a touch of exploration in which we control Morkull, God of death and darkness and lord of the Ragast, whose main mechanics lies in the breaking of the fourth wall, which will allow Morkull to communicate with the player in various ways.

name: Suikoden I & II HD Remaster: Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars
description: A hero's destiny is written in the Stars. The legendary Konami JRPGs Suikoden I and Suikoden II have now been remastered in HD!

name: Grimoire Groves
description: Restore the magical forest as you grow cute plant creatures with your witch magic in this cozy rogue-lite dungeon crawler. Unlock all spells, discover new plant types, befriend magical creatures, and unravel the mystery of the rainbow socks.

name: Slime Heroes
description: A game where the slimes are finally the heroes. Play together with your friends as adorable slimes - the only creature that can save the world from an evil corruption. Find different weapons and create your own unique magic abilities to express the way you want to adventure.

name: Asylum
description: An epic supernatural horror adventure and the spiritual successor to cult classic Scratches set in a massive, decaying mental institute. Inspired by H. P. Lovecraft, Hammer Films and twisted Euro Horror from the 80s.

name: Nebulock
description: Nebulock is a short bullet-hell game with intense gameplay, where the player must destroy bosses made of blocks, collect resources and upgrade his spaceship.

name: Dogs Contrast
description: Get ready for an exciting adventure where you will have to find 10 differences between two similar images with cute dogs.??

name: Miryam: The Polluted Land
description: Traverse the wasteland with Miryam. Use magic items to build defenses against evil spirits. It's a casual tower defense game of construction and resource balance. Characters grow via challenges, from timid to fearless and wild. The blend of building and defense makes it addictive and engaging
Let's do some easy math with the girls!

name: Treasure Hunt
description: Treasure Hunt is a fast-paced party game where up to 6 players compete as pirates to dig up hidden treasure chests, steal loot from each other, and outsmart their rivals. Use quick reflexes to dig, roll, and shoot your way to victory in chaotic, treasure-filled battles.

name: Lost Valley of the Frog King
description: You are the captain of an arctic expedition. Months into the voyage, you discover an uncharted island, encased in a wall of ice. You decide to take a closer look and meet with your boat on the far side of the island. What will you discover?

name: Soul Trader
description: Welcome to the NecronomiCon: The most anticipated convention for necromancers from across the land! Gather your minions and craft powerful synergies as you face your rivals in this inventive Roguelike Deckbuilder!

name: Undercover Fools
description: Infiltrate a secure building, cleverly bypass guards and traps, complete tasks with the help of cool spy gadgets. Play alone or with friends, upgrade your spy skills and plan excellent missions, and most importantly... Don't screw up!

name: Roll a Dice
description: "Roll a Dice" is a dice game full of strategy and luck, combining classic props and set effects. In this 8x6 building table, players need to roll dice, activate cells, and trigger different effects to accumulate points and challenge higher goals.

name: Skull Skull Skull
description: Skull Skull Skull is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you fight off hordes of skulls. Customize your gun and choose power ups to survive as long as possible.

description: Sin descripción
