description: A new release of Key's AIR visual novel marking the first-ever official English release, featuring retouched HD visuals and CG coloring, the side story novel "First Sky Chapter" in visual novel format and full voice support.

name: Eldrador Creatures: Shadowfall
description: The adventure-filled worlds of Eldrador are in danger! Lead battle-ready creatures in turn-based strategic combat to defeat a mysterious shadowy menace.

name: Journey Up
description: Gain sentience and climb up out of the mines and beyond on your own or online with up to 4 players. Play with checkpoints or without for a more tense experience. Supports VR and desktop monitor mode. Can you reach the top?

name: All Whispering Tome
description: A reading adventure game about exploring stories. The hidden stories in the game are unfold while you read multiple seamingly unrelated stories.

name: Golden Warden
description: A turn-based roguelike battle game with easy controls. Choose a card each turn to reach the depths of the dungeon and acquire the treasures guarded by the Golden Warden.

name: 1M84
description: An upcoming MMO RPG game with lots of fun and things to do! The things you can do are endless. With server updates planned every week!

name: SQR
description: YOU ARE SQR. PART OF YOU IS MISSING.

name: Super Miners
description: Descend as a brave miner, face mysterious enemies, overcome traps, and challenge legendary Creatures! Jump, run, mine, and fight! Craft potions, uncover secrets, break the curse, and leave your mark in history!

name: Pokémon Go: Might and Mastery
description: Sin descripción

name: Toy Scrappers
description: Toy Scrappers is a thrilling chase-based horror game that can be played with up to 16 players. Some players take on the role of a killer attempting to capture others. Escape the madness and stay alive!

name: The Wall
description: Defend the city, Fight the dead. In this fast paced zombie wall defence game set in a neon cyberpunk world, you must man the wall, upgrade defences and build robots and turrets. Face relentless waves of undead as you hold out as long as you can. Its not about if the wall falls its about when.

name: The Bear: A Story from the World of Gra
description: Home is where the stars are. An interactive bedtime story, for anyone who needs one. Take the bear and the little one on a deeply meaningful journey, as you experience stories of togetherness, of letting go and of finding a place you belong.

name: Firelore: Short Tales

name: Refence
description: Refence is a roguelike based idle defense game, where you can choose heroes and their traits, upgrade your castle, and manage resources to fend off enemies trying to attack your castle.

name: Surf Dance
description: Next to the cartoonish cute style island, with your favorite cute animals, experience the excitement of high-speed sprint in the rhythm of platform jumps.

name: Flood of Zombies
description: 《flood of zombies》 is a third-person roguelike shooting game in which the player takes on the role of a soldier, defending against numerous zombie attacks!

name: What's On The Menu?
description: In What's on the Menu?, step into the shoes of a restaurant manager. From selecting ingredients and crafting menus to hiring staff and customizing your restaurant, every decision counts. Face random events, unlock new recipes, and rise through the ranks to become the ultimate restaurateur!

name: Signal: Uncharted Lands
description: Embark on a journey with four adorable explorers! Uncover all the secrets of a post-apocalyptic world, meet the future inhabitants of Earth and enjoy plenty of Easter eggs. Your choices will shape the game's ending, so choose wisely! Or try a second playthrough to catch all the fun moments!

name: Siberian Way
description: Siberian Way is a historical detective thriller. Follow the dark non-linear story and decide how it can end! For all fans of snowy Siberia, Murder on the Orient Express and twisted plots, seasoned with mysticism.

name: Tiny Duck Hunt 3D
description: Next generation arcade game in a cute cartoon 3D world. Sweet graphics, nice gameplay, unique control system focused on handheld and joypad gaming.

name: Foddia
description:
Foddia is a 2D-Platformer inspired by Getting Over It. There are difficult challenges to overcome and mysteries to uncover at every turn. Swing on ropes, make long jumps across chasms, and climb your way to the top of the Foddian Mountain.

You came here for a reason.
Was it to climb this mountain that won't stop towering over you?
Was it to search for secrets in the depths unknown?
Was it to become the fastest hiker the world has ever seen?

The only certainty is that if you leave now...
You may never know why you came in the first place.

name: Lilac 0
description: The machine world of Molybdion has fallen into disarray. As Nidhogg eats the root of the planet, unending wars rage on the surface! Slice your way through hordes of metallic foes in five frantic levels, defeat fearsome bosses, and dodge countless bullets in this vintage vertical shoot 'em up.

name: Dinosaurs in Place
description: In this exciting two-dimensional puzzle game, you need to place your prehistoric friends on the grid so that they fit perfectly. Dinosaurs in Place offers 100 unique levels and 40 diverse dinosaurs that will not leave you indifferent.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Wallace & Gromit Special Pack
description:
Enter the wonderful world of Wallace & Gromit in PowerWash Simulator’s next big adventure – coming soon!

Embark on a cracking cleaning adventure that’ll take you from charming British suburbs to cheesy celestial bodies. Watch this space for more info and wishlist for updates, old chum.

name: Holy Shot
description: Holy Shot is a fast-paced, physics-based top-down shooter. Face nasty hordes of monsters in a chaotic environmental destruction, combining powerful weapons and strategic abilities to survive intense battles against challenging bosses.

name: Cat Lines
description: Cat Lines is a minimalist puzzle game where you help a cute kitten explore every block on the grid. With simple graphics and engaging challenges, it’s perfect for cat lovers and puzzle fans alike!

name: HenPri
description: Thrown into prison for an act of self-expression, protagonist Shuichiro must confront both a violent system and his own actions—or else try to find happiness on the inside in this censored visual novel from the makers of NUKITASHI.

name: Shadowveil: Legend of The Five Rings
description: Recruit and command a party of samurai on expeditions into the Shadowlands of the Legend of the Five Rings universe. Gain experience and cards in battle to develop units and create powerful combat combinations in this strategic roguelite.

name: Petrified Pawns
description: Petrified Pawns has chess-style movement and turn-based combat. Fight new types of chess pieces and bosses. Build your army and keep them alive while you advance through the dungeon. Use healing spells, loot and strategy to keep your king alive and to reach the end with as many units as possible.

name: Age of Mythology: Retold - Immortal Pillars
description:
Unleash the power of Chinese mythology in Age of Mythology: Retold’s first expansion, Immortal Pillars. Discover a new pantheon of gods, legendary myth units, and awe-inspiring god powers in an epic campaign inspired by ancient legends.

Summon the fierce goddess Nüwa, command Chiyou, the bull-headed god of war, and call upon Nüba, the relentless bringer of drought. Control the skies with Yinglong, the mighty flying rain dragon, and experience so much more.

name: Two Point Museum
description: Curate and manage incredible museums! Explore to discover amazing artifacts. Design and refine the layout, keep staff happy, guests entertained, donations plentiful… and children off the exhibits.

name: Cascadence
description: Survive and ultimately escape a foreign world using your creativity to assemble defenses with physics-based building.

name: Ball-it Hell
description: Dodge! Strike back! This is a fast-paced barrage arcade game. Move the character to dodge bullets. Pick the right time to strike bullets back and destroy enemies to get gold coins. Unlock more characters and powerful skills. Keep challenging yourself to get higher scores and rankings.

name: Knights in Tight Spaces
description: Control your environment, gather your party, and build your best deck to overcome outlaws and supernatural forces, across a rich fantasy world. Watch as your tactical choices and deckbuilding prowess play out through stylish fight sequences.

name: Tale of Ren: Searching for Heart Droplets
description: Me...Mizu Ren Nanami… As a REN people, it's time to go on a mission to conquer the hearts of people in other realms. Then, the Rostania is the town where I was chosen to come here. to the pursuit of secrets that were never known before.

name: Everhood 2
description: An unconventional arpg where you battle enemies through musical encounters while being accompanied by a Raven who promises you to retrieve your voice if you slay the mighty Mind Dragon!

name: War Robots: Frontiers
description: War Robots: Frontiers is an online multiplayer mech shooter that launches the War Robots universe into the stars. Build and customize your mechs, squad up, and unleash the destructive power of your machines in epic online battles.

name: Bullet Hell Action Roguelites
description: Sin descripción

name: Hello Girl
description: Have you ever felt like a rabbit with a telephone? Hello Girl is a thrilling kinetic visual novel about connection and disconnection, set during a time of great uncertainty.

name: Chess Bomb
description: Chess Bomb is a unique puzzle game where bombs take the shape of chess pieces. Strategically use these explosive chess bombs to fend off waves of invading monsters threatening the chess kingdom.

name: Shop Simulator: Waifu Pillows
description: Konnichiwa Shop-owner-kun! Become a hero of the weeb/otaku community in a cute Japanese suburb with your very own waifu pillow shop! Stock your shelves with exciting dakimakura designs, expand your store, and make a fortune in Shop Simulator: Waifu Pillows!

name: Save The Village: Tower Defense
description: Save The Village is a medieval tower defense game where you strategically protect villages from waves of skeletons, goblins, and fearsome bosses. Build powerful towers and use magical abilities to fend off the invading forces!

name: WDF
description: Sin descripción

name: Mop Skater
description: Cleaning isn’t just a chore, it’s a sport. Pull off insane tricks, string together epic combos, and battle the clock in this ridiculous first-person skate mopping adventure.

name: Old World: Wrath of Gods
description: Empires rise and fall through military might, political aptitude, and diplomatic savvy – but all know to fear, above all, the Wrath of Gods. Experience devastating natural disasters, a unique scenario that explores stories of legend, and the playable kingdom of Aksum.

name: Turbotz Testing 20XX
description:
Turbotz Testing 20XX is a tower defense game infused with clicker gameplay and rogue-lite elements. Join the Turbotz Institute in researching the explosive potential of turret robots by testing them under diverse conditions and parameters.

Collect research, unlock new elements to experiment with, and push the limits of existing turbotz through dynamic transformations. Discover the countless varieties of antroids and the creative ways to obliterate them!

Change the world—one explosion at a time.

Twitch Integration: Connect with Twitch to enable full audience participation in a 'Twitch Plays'-style experience with advanced customization options. Decide how viewers can interact—whether through structured voting or pure chaos.

Viewers can join the side of the Turbotz or the Antroids, with their chosen allegiance displayed alongside their username. Their contributions are tracked on a leaderboard, highlighting kills and damage dealt.

name: Destino Indomable
description: In Destino Indomable, you're the new actress tasked with playing the main character in a telenovela! This is a wild visual novel inspired by the craziest Latin soup operas, filled with humor, drama, romance, horses, handsome men, Spanglish and slaps!

name: Delirium
description: Delirium is a psychological horror game set in a suburban house. After a mysterious explosion, reality begins to unravel.

name: Deadly Heart Gambit
description: You only have 3 months left to live. Gamble for extra time in Alice-sama’s life-or-death game. Be careful — she wants to steal your heart.

name: Ragmonton Endless For Save Indie Game
description: Physics-Based Ragdoll Roguelike up to 4 players with Endless action to survive > Get items and discover powerful transformations to increase your power to survive the invading alien horde and save indie games.

name: Songs of Life
description: Card drama adventure game. With the epidemic, no one can be left alone. You will play as Hua Tuo, Zhang Zhongjing and Dong Feng, with the help of surgery, potions, and even the power of the gods, to end this tragic chaos, uncover the truth of the world and destroy the culprits of it all.

name: Alma and the Fragments of Cursed Memories
description: One day, Alma finds herself presented with a sudden money-making opportunity that could solve all her problems. And so she sets out to meet the client...An RPG mystery about doing whatever it takes to get paid!

name: Interstellar Escape

It is important to note that the game is not about finding out if a room has changed, but rather that each room is different and you must be aware of the signals that these changes give you.

name: MIKU: May I Keep Up?
description:
A second-person physics-based platformer about love, loss, and the struggle to move on.
Parkour your way up through scattered memories of love in form of platforming challenges while you control two characters bound to each other by a thread while listening to healing journey of a man recovering from a heart wrenching breakup.

description: Sin descripción

name: Spirit Channel
description: An indie horror game made by ThundyVT who began making this game in Dec 2024. In this game, you try to survive from a monster trying to murder you. The way to get out is by entering the digits for the code.

name: The Curse of the Howling Woods
description:
You signed up for a simple job - pull some weeds, make a little cash. Instead, you got bitten by a werewolf, tricked by an old woman, and thrown into a maze of crypts, curses, and questionable life choices.

Now you have two hours to undo your fate before you sprout fur and start howling at the moon.

The Curse of the Howling Woods is a 2D adventure game that blends classic horror tropes, witty dialogue, and cozy but chaotic gameplay. Navigate haunted woods, solve puzzles, dodge traps, and try not to get mugged by a pumpkin.

Features

Cozy Combat – Enemies? One hit and they’re gone. You? Well… hopefully, you’re lucky.

A Maze of Mayhem – Crypts, quicksand, rolling boulders—this forest wants you to fail.

A Cast of Oddballs – Befriend (or avoid) scam-artist Eudora, overly dramatic ghosts, and Tim the werewolf, who insists it was just business.

Survive the night, break the curse, and maybe - just maybe - get paid for your trouble.

name: Parallel Rift
description: Parallel Rift is a four-dimensional puzzle game where you navigate through interconnected spaces along the W-axis to reach the goal. Experience an unseen direction in this casual first-person puzzle adventure.

name: Lets Get Loot
description: Dive into a fantasy idle/incremental game where hack-and-slash combat meets endless progression! Defeat enemies, collect epic loot, and level up to unlock new powers. Craft artifacts, conquer powerful bosses, and grow stronger! Forge your path to greatness in a world of endless adventure!

name: Outlawed
description: Outlawed is a crime-themed PvPvE first-person extraction shooter, set in a modern city overrun by gangs. Enter solo or with a squad to challenge powerful enemies and search for riches, and use everything at your disposal to make it out alive.

name: Castle of Shikigami 3
description: ・A culmination of character shooting games set in a unique worldview! ・A wide variety of newly added playable characters and attack methods, as well as a 2P scenario that is different from 1P play. ・Features a high-tension MAX system that will satisfy your insatiable passion for shooting games!

name: One Last Job
description: One Last Job is a moddable team management game, where you work to build your reputation as a fixer by successfully completing jobs with your crew.

name: Another Round

Another Round is a deckbuilder / slots-style game. Your goal is to stay in business and make your cyberpunk cafe into a social hub which everyone in the community enjoys.

There is no timer or countdown clock putting pressure on you to make decisions quickly; you will not need to do a lot of math or rely on perfect play to have a good time.

name: Darth Vader Tamagotchi
description: The third Star Wars themed Tamagotchi.

name: Vector Strike
description: Vector Strike is a fast-paced, physics based, non violent digital sport where mastery and teamwork are key to win. Shoot, double-jump, wall run, slide, dash, pass and score goals in intense matches where every decision counts. Pick your striker from a roster of powerful characters, each with unique abilities to master.

name: Emissary Zero
description: Co-op horror (1-4 players). You are sent to explore a mysterious building at night. Fix all the equipment and try to return alive.

name: Merchant 64
description: Merchant 64 a tiny retro inspired traveling merchant game! Take control of Merchant as you buy goods at low prices and sell them in different towns at higher prices.

name: Raid Auctus
description: Assemble your raid team, gather EXP, and conquer challenges for legendary rewards. Upgrade, strategize, and become the ultimate raid master!

name: Discopup
description: In DISCOPUP, you're a seal eager to party, making your way to the most famous nightclub in the city: DiscoPup. However, tonight, the bouncer is only letting dogs in. How will you make it past him?

name: Minutescape
description: Dodge bullets and upgrade yourself in Minutescape, a retro-inspired incremental game that keeps unfolding. Unlock new abilities and keep upgrading yourself to survive for 5 consecutive minutes.

name: Gas Station Manager
description: An ultimate 1-4 player Co-op Simulation game where you build and manage your gas station completely from scratch. Team up with your friends, provide exceptional service and grow your business! Collaboration (and some chaos!) is the key to success—fuel up, have your fun and rise to the top!

name: Chaos Ascension
description: Survive relentless waves of monsters in this fast paced rogue lite action game. Choose your hero, defeat epic bosses, and unlock powerful upgrades in a dark, procedurally generated world.

name: Null State
description:
Null State is a moddable CRPG built on classic gameplay styles and themes found in cyberpunk games from the late 80s and early 90s.

Inspired by classic cyberpunk stories (& other, older tales of downtrodden folk heroes), you will be tasked with helping the people in your community until you discover that your world is barely holding together — and about to be pushed over the brink.

name: The Travelers
description: The travelers is a 2d mmo and text-based adventure. explore a massive world full of worn cities and dusty buildings. discover items, build bases, engage in combat, or work together to solve the wasteland's hidden mystery.

name: Videophobia
description: You are in a room without windows or doors. The TV dimly illuminates the room. What is this, a box? How to open it? After solving the riddle, you find the TV remote control. Click... a door appeared. You step into the darkness and hear laughter... turn around and find out what's behind the screen.

name: Cinemaster Cinema Simulator
description: Run your own cinema! Set showtimes, print tickets, buy new films, pop popcorn, upgrade and clean theaters. Vending machines, staffs, upgrades, and much more are coming soon!

name: AAA Simulator
description: Become the CEO of a AAA studio and make important decisions like who to hire and who to fire. Handle events like a pro by making acquisitions or layoffs. Steer the company in any direction as long as it satisfies shareholders - and that means maximizing profit!

name: I Come In Peace
description: Don't panic! survive the bullet hell action. As a goofy pacifist alien that crashed on Earth, use your tech abilities to evade paranoid humans whose deadly attacks on you cause destruction and mayhem. Navigate the chaos, collect your spaceship parts, and run the hell out of this crazy planet!

name: Upstream
description: Play as a salmon journeying home in this challenging physics based platformer using only two buttons! Remember that on a voyage through innumerable obstacles and constant danger, it is your reaction to adversity that determines your success.

name: Space Menace 2
description: Start small, expand your fleet, rise to power, and eventually command entire factions in this seamless blend of sci-fi space RTS and battle game. With strategic gameplay and evolving challenges, every decision shapes your legacy in the stars.

name: Eyes That Hypnotise
description: A cozy, hand-drawn puzzle where you arrange fluffy friends to fit the grid. With their funny big eyes and a calming mood, this game offers a relaxing escape.

name: Flocking Hell
description: Flocking Hell is a turn-based strategy roguelite where you defend your pasture from demon legions. It blends calm exploration with auto-battler combat, offering a mix of easy-to-learn mechanics and deep strategy. It also has a lot of sheep.

name: Damashi Game
description: A thrilling multiplayer experience where social deception, strategy, and quick thinking are your greatest weapons. Outsmart your opponents and be the last player standing in this intense fight for survival.

name: Kokoro Clover Sun: Prehistoric Invaders!
description: The second installment in the 2000s era styled anime-themed Kokoro Clover series! A visual novel paired with boss battles! Our heroes' next adventure is in...dinosaur times?! This time the bad guys are trying to destroy the future! The only way to fight back is with dino-transformations!

name: Toushin Gent
description: Seeking the coveted Goon Crystal and Bloodline Emblem, the Brutal Cook Gent must face Bendy Town and its strange dungeon. Guide our reluctant "hero" as he faces unwanted attention from friends and foe alike in this "unique" experience of a game.

name: Lucha Libre: Legend of the Mask
description: Join the action in our 2D side-scrolling beat 'em up game for up to four players! Immerse yourself in the colorful world of Mexican Lucha Libre, where unique mechanics combine the elegant yet brutal art of lucha libre with classic combat. Team up and unleash spectacular moves to defeat your foes!

name: Domovoy
description: Domovoy is a psychological horror game from the first person, the game takes place in a Soviet apartment in the late 80s. Are you ready to meet the Domovoy?

name: Tret
description: A hybrid puzzler set in a synthwave world. Complex platforming meets physics-based synthball manipulation, with a dash of high-speed races across a neon-soaked landscape, all set to the tune of a killer electronic soundtrack paying homage to the colorful eighties.

name: Fluffy Sailors
description: Fluffy Sailors is a charming roguelite adventure where you engage in thrilling sea battles, shooting your fluffy crew onto the ships of other animal pirates.

name: The Crew: Motorfest - Season 6
description: Sin descripción

name: Merchants of Rosewall
description: As a new Merchant in the bustling city of Rosewall you'll manage your own shop, craft artisan goods, hire Companions, and even unravel a mystery of the city! Immerse yourself in a fantasy world where conflict is a thing of the past in this narrative driven, fantasy shop keeper simulator.

name: Frontier Paladin
description: You are an Apprentice Paladin, following your Master on your first quest. Survive by engaging your enemies in deliberate and impactful combat with a variety of play styles. Rally your beleaguered Order, improve your Castle and it's defenses, and hold fast against the Warlords of the Crater.

name: Einstein's Cats
description: Cats in boxes; alive or dead? Wait, no, no this isn’t Schroedinger. This is Einstein’s Cats! A cozy, relaxing logic puzzle game about cats and boxes; which cats go where? But be careful, you know how picky cats can be!

name: Nine Nights
description: In Northeast China, there is a beautiful legend about the little fox fairy: In ancient times, the Five Immortals and Holy Spirit lived in the deep mountains and forests of Northeast China, guarding this land and all things inside. Every Holy Spirit possesses a unique power and mission.

name: Sugardew Island: Your Cozy Farm Shop
description: In this cozy farming game, you have to run your own farm shop. Take care of your animals and your farm, sell your goods to the cute Forest Folk, upgrade the island and fulfill small orders from the Harmony Tree to fill the island with life again.

name: Solar War
description: Solar War! A fast-paced, space-themed, shoot-em-up, bullet hell, arcade style game where players attempt to shoot and weave through a horde of enemy planets in a bid to survive just a little bit longer.

name: SandRipper
description: Tear across the desert, obliterating wave after wave with speed and precision. A punchy arcade shooter with unlimited weapon combinations!

name: Endless RPG: Untold Tales
description: Craft a party of diverse characters, each with customizable skills and looks. Explore a living world with dynamic day-night cycles, changing seasons, and diverse biomes. Embark on an epic journey where you shape your destiny as the director of your unique story.

name: Woodlawn: The End of the World
description:
When scientists try to create and control magic, their first spell goes wrong, and monsters are accidentally brought to life and destroy cities. Now the military has to hold off and contain the monsters while scientists try to figure out how to undo the spell.

The enemies AI can detect the skill of the player and automatically adjust difficulty based on player performance.

name: The Beekeeper's Picnic
description: Beekeeper (and former world’s greatest detective) Sherlock Holmes is arranging a surprise picnic for his friend Watson. Unfortunately pesky mysteries keep getting in the way! Explore, find clues and interrogate your neighbours in this cosy point and click adventure!

name: Fable of Fairy Stones
description: Dive into a nostalgic retro 3D DOT RPG world! A significant level of suspense awaits you.

name: Wacambria Island
description: Explore ancient ruins for treasure and upgrades while avoiding traps and solving puzzles in this retro-inspired Action-Adventure RPG. Slash your way through dangerous creatures with a variety of weapons. Explore a diverse island full of hidden secrets and learn to wield a mysterious power.

name: Pixelpusher
description: Delightfully simple online multiplayer action

name: Afterblast
description: Afterblast is a challenging FPS rogue-lite action game. Play solo or in co-op. Features dynamic gameplay with randomly generated dungeons, so don't hesitate to obtain the power, unlock new loot, and find a way to save your planet. Stand up against the gods and fight against hordes of monsters.

name: Warspace 2
description: Warspace 2 is an open world RPG space shooter where you can trade, craft, fight and explore procedurally generated universe!

name: Crashers of Aetheria
description: Crashers of Aetheria is a strategy card collecting game. Players use Crashers to strategically take out their opponent online or offline.

name: Zone of Action
description: Zone of Action is a cooperative adventure mode where players navigate through tiers of rooms, choosing from various classes that provide unique perks. Players will fight enemies, mini-bosses, and face off against a big boss, all while exploring a rich lore set in both indoor and outdoor environments.

name: Train Traffic Manager: GOTY Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tank vs. Tank: Prime Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Full Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Snooker Fever: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Formula Racing Pro 2025: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Darts Fever: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Bowling Fever: Discovery Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Shrine of the Forest God
description: Explore and fight your way through a dense and sprawling world filled with mystery. Take your checkpoint with you while discovering secrets and abilities as you fight your way up the mountain you found yourself in. Do you have what it takes to slay the Forest God?

name: Eternal Prowl
description:
After many years, you return to your hometown, but nothing is as you remember it. The streets are empty, familiar places feel distant, and the past seems to have faded away. The old school bus is your only clue, leading you deeper into a mystery that begs to be solved.

Immerse yourself in an emotional journey filled with forgotten memories and unsettling discoveries. As you explore an abandoned house, you’ll uncover hidden secrets and solve a crucial puzzle that reveals the truth behind the town’s eerie transformation.

name: Haydee 3
description: Haydee III is a hardcore metroidvania with third-person shooter mechanics, platforming, puzzles, a sexy heroine and cake!

name: 1917: The Alien Invasion DX Remastered
description: You are in the role of Dr. Brunhild Stahlmüller, an acomplished weapon scientist who upgrades a WW1 triplane with superior alien technology to attack the invaders. You will avenge mankind and take the battle into the darkness of space until you reach an ancient alien world.

name: Call of Warzone
description: Fight with strategy, dominate the battlefield, claim your victory

name: Art of Glide 3
description: Spread your wings and discover the beauty of a boundless world, one landmark at a time.

name: Leap Year: March
description:
Leap Year: March continues the adventure for players who have beaten Leap Year and want an even greater challenge.

Delve into another hand drawn world that’s both larger and more complex than the original. Master your understanding of Leap Year’s secrets to complete another month of your calendar.

name: Whispers of the Dead
description: A psychological horror game that blurs the lines between love, fear, and reality. The story begins with Eve Levine, a college student caught in a nightmare after being abducted on a rainy evening in the shadowy St. Peters Park. Her fiancé, Adam Hale, a poet haunted by his own creations, must confront the darkness that emerges from his mysterious writings.

name: Double Dangerous
description: Shooting freedom—aim anywhere and unleash chaos with dual guns!

name: Farming Simulator VR
description: In a relaxing hands-on experience, Farming Simulator VR brings you closer to the soil: Cultivate your fields with yielding crops like corn, wheat & soy. Operate authentic agricultural machinery by renowned manufacturers, directly in the cabin of powerful tractors. Grab repair tools to maintain your vehicles and their parts in the workshop. Tend to vegetables in the greenhouse, and don’t forget to keep your machines sparkling-clean with the pleasure of power-washing!

name: Yosuga no Sora
description: The censored port for Yosuga no Sora.

name: PGA Tour 2K25
description: The master of golf sims is back! Tee off with the world’s top golfers on the most storied courses on golf’s biggest stages.

name: Bewilder House: Enhanced Edition
description:
Bewilder House is a classic first-person horror puzzle game that challenges your perception and willpower. Trapped in shifting mazes where the walls open and close when you're not looking, you'll need to rely on your mind and first-person controls to navigate a deceptive funhouse that manipulates your surroundings and your sense of reality. Every corner hides a new obstacle; every escape is just another illusion.

This enhanced edition brings minor improvements that breathe new life into the classic Bewilder House experience, making it easier to immerse yourself in the twisted horrors lurking within. Key Features:

Immersive Horror Atmosphere: Feel the pressure as you confront the unsettling twists and turns of a world that isn’t as it seems.

Challenging Puzzles: Solve mind-bending puzzles that play with both your sense of direction and your reality.

Enhanced Performance: Smoother frame rates and optimized controls for a more responsive and enjoyable experience.Note: The enhanced edition has no extra in-game content compared to the original.

name: Justice Ninja Casey
description: The 16-bit classic comes to the West for the very first time! A princess in a castle has been kidnapped by a group of mysterious ninjas. Luckily for her, a young ninja named Casey is aware of the situation, and embarks on a mission to save her because... He is the Ninja of Justice!

name: Mojika: Truth Rears Its Ugly Head
description: Explore themes of bullying, revenge, blackmail, and abuse, interwoven with lies, truth, beauty, and ugliness. The story follows an ugly boy who reaches his breaking point due to constant torment and decides to use his power to read thoughts to seek revenge.

name: Exanimate
description: Exanimate is a 1-4 player co-op survival game where you face off against never-ending legions of Zeds and their innumerable variations in a valiant attempt to escape with your lives, your riches and your highest possible scores! How long can you hold out against the Exanimate?

name: Oceanlust: Erotic Descent
description: Who can say no when the opportunity of a lifetime drops into their lap? A submarine tour of the world’s most famous shipwreck alongside the sexiest girl you’ve ever met. Sure, there were a lot of waivers to sign but it’ll be fine. They know what they’re doing… Right...?

name: Asleep: Ato 2
description: Upon mysteriously waking up on the outskirts of a small village, Ana Lúcia continues her journey in search of answers in a supposedly peaceful new environment but soon experiences suspicious events forcing her to face even more intense and disturbing dangers. The nightmare continues.

name: Street Cleaner 3
description: In this 8 bit retro action platformer sequel, you play as the eponymous Street Cleaner taking back the streets of San Diego from punks, ninjas, and now some weird spooky creatures! You're not alone, though. You can switch at will between the Street Cleaner, whip wielding rival turned ally Cogex, and high-school girl brawler Honoko who each bring their own attacks and abilities.

name: Sonic Rumble
description: On your mark, get set...PLAY! Get ready to race in the Sonic Rumble! Jump into a speedy, 32-person mobile royale set in a cheery toy world created by Dr. Eggman. Play as some of your favorite characters from the Sonic the Hedgehog universe complete with customization to create your perfect avatar as you dive into action-packed gameplay.

name: Dollhouse: Behind the Broken Mirror
description:
Enter the broken mind of Eliza de Moor, a once-celebrated singer, now trapped in the labyrinth of her own forgotten memories. The only hope for recovering her memories lies with Doctor Stern and his experimental medicine. As Eliza, you'll navigate the reality and the world behind the broken mirror, guided by the effects of the drug.

Will you be able to piece together the mystery of your past, or will you get lost in this dark and twisted reality?

name: Who's Next?
description: 『Who's Next?』 is a real-time multiplayer social deduction game set in the traditional Korean hell, featuring a massacre of ghosts and spirits, with individual survival competition rather than team battles, focusing on 'Chasing Tail'.

name: Hidden Cosmo Cats: Bonus Level
description: Hidden Cosmo Cats - Bonus Level includes one additional hand-drawn level with 100 more cats to find! ️‍

name: Cosmo Cats
description: Hidden Cosmo Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this big cosmic location! Test your attention and relax in this cozy and free game ️‍♂️

name: Foto Boy: A New Job
description: Capture the Moment! Embark on a thrilling journey with Kin dream job.

name: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest
description: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest is a card-based deep survival simulator and the next installment in the Card Survival Series. Carve yourself a home in a primordial forest that has a will of its own. A day-to-day life simulator in a world where nature reigns with mystery, beauty and sometimes cruelty.

name: Bubumbu
description: Bubumbu is a short and wholesome hidden objects game with a unique twist in which you get to help lost objects find their way back to where they belong, while exploring fully hand-drawn worlds full of quirky characters.

name: The Beautiful Island
description: A short visual novel about war, peace and hope. Explore a city after a devastating war. Talk to people, try to understand, try to help. The heroes of war are dead, but you can be a hero of peace!

name: Fantastyc Murder Mystery
description: Immerse yourself in a thrilling Murder Mystery where you play as the perpetrator or detective. Other players worldwide will scrutinize your every move as they attempt to solve your murders. Meanwhile, sift through evidence, and uncover the true culprit in unique player-generated crime scenes.

name: Monster Hunter Wilds
description: The unbridled force of nature runs wild and relentless, with environments transforming drastically from one moment to the next. This is a story of monsters and humans and their struggles to live in harmony in a world of duality.

name: Mycelium Heaven
description: It's a cozy yet challenging puzzle game about a mushroom that devours zombies. You'll expand, grow and consume your way through the forest using your wit and reason.

name: Lawin Catch The Kim
description: Lawin Catch The Kim is a fun puzzle game~Chicken Kim never eats and runs wild outside every day. As Kim's good friend, you need to take them all back to the chicken coop and eat obediently! The game is always given 20 levels.Take all Kim home!

name: Mushroom Picnic Party
description: Help find little mushrooms and prepare for an epic picnic party in this cute hidden object game!

name: Moon's Creed: Genesis
description: Moon's Creed: Genesis is an RPG game with deep character types, active and passive skill systems to support infinite character structures. Players gather adventurers, enjoy automatic battles, advance talent trees, craft equipment, and make strategic decisions for their town.

name: Lethal Dose
description: Top-Down action: Blood, Magic, Stealth, Drugs! Make your own Levels

name: 99 Fails
description: Can you hold your focus while platforming through Zeebo's bizarre nightmare? Uncover his sad backstory in adventure mode and unlock 3 mechanics to race friends in PVP multiplayer to music by the awesome David Wise!

name: Celestine
description: Celestine, by the makers of Final Battle, features an enthralling story with many twists and turns, and a gameplay to satisfy the itch of RPG players. It is a must-have for fans of the old Final Fantasy, Dragon Quest and Breath of Fire.

name: Heart of Summer
description: "Heart of Summer" is a visual novel style high school dating sim. You spend one summer at a Japanese high school and try to get the girlfriend you've always wanted!

name: Desecrators
description: Desecrators is a retro FPS inspired by '90s six-degrees-of-freedom shooters. Plunder your way through the galaxy to destructive weapons and technology powerful enough to take on the ultimate heist: The legendary vaults of the Galactic Treasury.

name: [REC] Desolation
description: [REC] Desolation takes you to an abandoned manor as journalist Ethan Carter. Your goal is to investigate its dark past and uncover the truth. But some secrets should remain hidden…

name: Thin Line
description: A short time before fading away.

name: World At War: Normandy
description: Sin descripción

name: Sugoi Girls: Sexy Steampunk
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Waifu 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Backrooms: Exit from Supermarket Horror
description: Sin descripción

name: Suikaiju x Red Panda Bundle
description: Red Panda is Hungry + Suikaiju

name: Pohinki Simulator
description: Pohinki Simulator is a survival game set in a polish neighbourhood, where you need to explore the open world in search for trash in order to survive and gain power. Explore the forgotten streets of Tarnow and find the treasures that others threw away in this abstract reality, filled with secrets waiting to be discovered.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Pack
description:
The DAIMA: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Pack includes the following content:
• DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm Part 1 (July-Sep 2025)
• DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm Part 2 (Jan-Mar 2026)
• DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm Pack Bonus
- Items: Ultimate Meat Feast, Mega Sacred Water, Purple Dino Horn, and Awakening Water

name: Nina in Depravity
description:
Nina in Depravity is Nymph Circus first game.
A survival adventure where you control Nina, who is looking for her sister in a nightmarish manor.
